classData.comment:
/**
 * @class Neo.component.Base
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 */
classData.name: Base

classData.comment:
/**
         * True automatically applies the core/Observable.mjs mixin
         * @member {Boolean} observable=true
         * @static
         */
classData.description: True automatically applies the core/Observable.mjs mixin
classData.name: observable

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.component.Base'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} ntype='component'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: ntype

classData.comment:
/**
         * The name of the App this component belongs to
         * @member {String|null} appName_=null
         */
classData.description: The name of the App this component belongs to
classData.name: appName_

classData.comment:
/**
         * True automatically mounts a component after being rendered.
         * Use this for the top level component of your app.
         * @member {Boolean} autoMount=false
         * @tutorial 02_ClassSystem
         */
classData.description: True automatically mounts a component after being rendered. Use this for the top level component of your app.
classData.name: autoMount

classData.comment:
/**
         * True automatically renders a component after being created inside the init call.
         * Use this for the top level component of your app.
         * @member {Boolean} autoRender=false
         * @see {@link Neo.component.Base#init init}
         * @tutorial 02_ClassSystem
         */
classData.description: True automatically renders a component after being created inside the init call. Use this for the top level component of your app.
classData.name: autoRender

classData.comment:
/**
         * Bind configs to model.Component data properties.
         * Example for a button.Base:
         * @example
         * bind: {
         *     iconCls: data => `fa fa-{$data.icon}`,
         *     text   : data => data.foo.bar
         * }
         * @see https://github.com/neomjs/neo/blob/dev/examples/model
         * @member {Object|null} bind=null
         */
classData.description: Bind configs to model.Component data properties. Example for a button.Base:
classData.name: bind

classData.comment:
/**
         * manager.Focus will change this flag on focusin & out dom events
         * @member {Boolean} containsFocus_=false
         * @protected
         */
classData.description: manager.Focus will change this flag on focusin & out dom events
classData.name: containsFocus_

classData.comment:
/**

         */
classData.description: Assign a component controller to this component (pass an imported module or the string based class name)
classData.name: controller_

classData.comment:

classData.comment:

classData.description: Delta updates for the cls config. Gets called after the cls config gets changed in case the component is mounted.
classData.name: updateCls

classData.comment:
/**
     * Creates the style deltas for newValue & oldValue and applies them directly to the DOM.
     * @param {Object|String} value
     * @param {Object|String} oldValue
     * @param {String} [id=this.id]
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Creates the style deltas for newValue & oldValue and applies them directly to the DOM.
classData.name: updateStyle

classData.comment:
/**
     * Gets called after the vdom config gets changed in case the component is already mounted (delta updates).
     * @param {Object} vdom
     * @param {Neo.vdom.VNode} vnode
     * @param {function} [resolve] used by promiseVdomUpdate()
     * @param {function} [reject] used by promiseVdomUpdate()
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Gets called after the vdom config gets changed in case the component is already mounted (delta updates).
classData.name: updateVdom

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event after focusEnter, focusLeave or focusMove
 * @event focusChange
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} [data.path] dom element ids upwards
 * @param {Object[]} [data.oldPath] dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event after focusEnter, focusLeave or focusMove
classData.name: focusChange

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path
 * @event focusEnter
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} data.path dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path
classData.name: focusEnter

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is not included inside the dom id path
 * @event focusLeave
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} data.oldPath dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is not included inside the dom id path
classData.name: focusLeave

classData.comment:
/**
 * manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path, but the path itself changed
 * @event focusMove
 * @param {Object} data
 * @param {Object[]} data.path dom element ids upwards
 * @param {Object[]} data.oldPath dom element ids upwards
 */
classData.description: manager.Focus fires the event when the component id is included inside the dom id path, but the path itself changed
classData.name: focusMove
